episode: Employed a trademan to do a job and he bailed part way through and went completely missing in action.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I employed a tradesman to do a job on my house and he bailed part way through and went completely missing in action.  I couldn't believe anyone would do that, leaving me in the lurch and incurring extra costs.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds incredibly frustrating. I'm sorry you're going through this.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: He wouldn't answer my calls for a while and I assumed he would come back until eventually I had to abandon him.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's really disappointing.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Nothing I could do about it either, he just got away with it.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's so unfair.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Indeed.  The scaffolding which was up for him to finish was costing me money to keep up and the scaffolder was chasing me to complete or pay more.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That must have been so stressful.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I understand.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I contacted someone who had done work for me before and he finished it.  If anything goes wrong with it I have no comeback as can't tell who's fault it would be.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's really tough.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: And it cost a lot of money.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sorry to hear that.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: He was recommend to me as well.  Made me very distrusting of tradesman.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I understand your frustration.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: They don't seem to have any ability to communicate or desire to get the job done in a timely fashion.  So frustrating.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds really frustrating.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: They aren't part of any trade body or anything so there is usually nothing you can do.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That makes it even harder.
